original_text: And at mealtime Boaz said to her, “Come here and eat some bread and dip your morsel in the wine.” So she sat beside the reapers, and he passed to her roasted grain. And she ate until she was satisfied, and she had some left over.
korean_text: 식사할 때에 보아스가 룻에게 이르되 이리로 와서 떡을 먹으며 네 떡 조각을 초에 찍으라 하므로 룻이 곡식 베는 자 곁에 앉으니 그가 볶은 곡식을 주매 룻이 배불리 먹고 남았더라

sentences.original_text: and dip your morsel in the wine
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 한 조각을 포도주에 찍어라

sentences.original_text: So she sat beside the reapers
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그녀는 거두는 사람들 곁에 앉았다

sentences.original_text: and he passed to her roasted grain
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그녀에게 볶은 곡식을 건네주었다

sentences.original_text: And she ate until she was satisfied
and she had some left over
